name: Ruler by Default
description: Ruler by Default is a fantasy/comedy/drama visual novel, played from the perspective of a 21 year old male who is inadvertently summoned to another dimension and subsequently crowned successor to an evil overlord after an unexpected twist of events.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space
